passkeyCreate.header: Let's get you set up with

passkeyBenefits.body_introduction: With passkeys, you don't need to remember complex passwords anymore. Log in securely by using
passkeyBenefits.body_loginMethods: Face ID, Touch ID or screen lock code.

passkeySuccess.body_text1: You can now confirm your identity using your
passkeySuccess.body_text2: passkey or via email one-time passcode

passkeyError.body_errorMessage1: Creating your account was not possible with
passkeyError.body_errorMessage2: . Try again or sign up with email one-time passcode.

emailOtp.header: Enter one-time passcode to create account
emailOtp.body_text1: We just sent a one-time passcode to
emailOtp.body_text2: . The one-time passcode expires shortly, so please enter it soon.
